form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Menendez introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To increase the maximum penalty for unfair and deceptive practices relating to advertising of the costs of air transportation.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Real Transparency in Airfares Act of 2014
.

section.header: Increased penalties for unfair and deceptive airfare advertising practices
section.text: Section 46301(a) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Penalty for violations of unfair and deceptive airfare advertising practices
paragraph.text: Notwithstanding paragraph (1), the maximum civil penalty assessed on a person for an unfair or deceptive practice in violation of section 41712 and described in section 399.84 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations (or any corresponding similar regulation or ruling), shall beâ€”

subparagraph.text: if the person is an individual or small business concern, $2,500.
